main event: A civilian observed an unidentified flying object resembling a broad, short propeller gliding just above the trees in Indianapolis on 29 July 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as aluminum and shiny in color., It was approximately 6-1/2 feet long and 1-1/2 to 2 feet wide., The object was traveling at a speed of 25 to 30 MPH., Witnesses reported no discernible sound or exhaust trails from the object., The object was last seen gliding down into a densely wooded area.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object shaped like a broad short propeller
witness description: Two male civilians, employed by W.O. Jones Thug, were driving a truck at the time of the sighting.
